/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape. Trees line the sides of the road, adding a touch of greenery to the scene. Buildings of various sizes and designs fill the background, indicative of the city's architectural diversity. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene and highlighting the hustle and bustle of city life.
